content.rendered:
Directed by Dhruv Lather

Written by Dhruv Lather

Cast Tusshar Kapoor (Rajiv Dixit). Chelsha Gosai (Lisa). Aakash Dahiya (Mahesh). Rahul Dev (Anthony). Rushil Jain (Hacker). Seerat Kapoor (Reena). Kiran Kumar (Commissioner Prasad). Taiyaba Mansuri (Asharam girl). Anita Hassanandani Reddy (Sushmita Dixit). Naseeruddin Shah (Mr. Lobo). Dipannita Sharma (Shalini Mehta).

Language Hindi

Producers Alex Anthony Fernandes. Narendra Hirawat. Shreyans Hirawat. Priyank Jain. Girish Johar. Tusshar Kapoor. Abdul Aziz Makani. Kuldeep Ojha. Sumit Dinkar Pol. Kshitij Prasad. Poonam Sharma.

Production NH Studioz. Tusshar Entertainment House
